q1.title: How would you describe the overall level of fatigue/tiredness you have experienced?

q2.title: How would you describe the overall level of Ankylosing spondylitis neck, back or hip pain you have had?

q3.title: How would you describe the overall level of pain/swelling in joints other than your neck, back or hips that you have had?

q4.title: How would you describe the overall level of discomfort you have had from any areas tender to touch or pressure?

q5.title: How would you describe the overall level of morning stiffness you have had from the time you wake up?

q6.title: How long does your morning stiffness last from the time you wake up?
